basque.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a piece of underwear for a woman that covers her body from under her arms to the top of her legs
basque.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a person from the mountainous area between southern France and northern Spain. Some people who live in this area consider themselves to be a separate nation that does not belong to either France or Spain, and some Basques in Spain have tried to gain political independence.
basque.translation[1].definitions[1].def: the language of the Basques, which is unusual because it is not related to any other language in the world
